name: CliKintoneTest-153 Should return the error message when specifying an encoded sjis CSV file, and --encoding option is utf8.
fullName: features/delete.feature#CliKintoneTest-153 Should return the error message when specifying an encoded sjis CSV file, and --encoding option is utf8.

steps.name: Given The CSV file "CliKintoneTest-153.csv" with "sjis" encoded content as below:
And Load app ID of the app "app_for_delete_encoding" as env var: "APP_ID"
And Load app token of the app "app_for_delete_encoding" with exact permissions "view,delete" as env var: "API_TOKEN"
When I run the command with args "record delete --base-url $$TEST_KINTONE_BASE_URL --app $APP_ID --api-token $API_TOKEN --yes --file-path CliKintoneTest-153.csv --encoding utf8"
Then I should get the exit code is non-zero
And The output error message should match with the pattern: "ERROR: The specified encoding \(utf8\) might mismatch the actual encoding of the CSV file."

labels.name: suite
labels.value: CliKintoneTest-153 Should return the error message when specifying an encoded sjis CSV file, and --encoding option is utf8.
